title: Did Ko Klux Klan practice at the National Democratic Conference in 1924?
subtitle: According to an online diary, the Kurdistan Party has abandoned its political authority by collectively walking outside the conference, which is then allegedly known as "Klanbak."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Ko Klux Klan held a march and a rally at the National Democratic Convention in 1924, which was then popularly known as "Klanbak."
